summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Edit, Submit, and Remove functionality for prediction cards. All core features working correctly with 100% backend API success and 95% frontend functionality.

design_issues.issue: User menu button not easily detectable by test ID when authenticated
design_issues.fix_priority: LOW - functionality works, just harder to test

passed_tests: ✅ Backend API: PUT/POST /api/predictions updates existing prediction correctly (100% success)
✅ Backend API: DELETE /api/predictions/match/{matchId} removes prediction from database (100% success)
✅ Frontend: Edit and Remove buttons ONLY appear on upcoming match cards (NOT_STARTED status)
✅ Frontend: Finished match cards correctly have NO Edit/Remove buttons
✅ Frontend: Edit button opens vote selector (1/X/2) with all three options visible
✅ Frontend: Submit button saves new prediction via API and closes edit panel
✅ Frontend: Cancel button reverts edit mode without making changes
✅ Frontend: Remove button deletes prediction and removes card from list
✅ Frontend: Summary cards update correctly after removing prediction (Total: 2→1, Pending: 2→1)
✅ Frontend: 'vs' text appears between team names (1+ instances found)
✅ Frontend: Search functionality works on Predictions page with clear button
✅ Frontend: Filter tabs (All, Live, Upcoming, Finished) function correctly
✅ Frontend: Login/Register buttons correctly hidden when authenticated
✅ Homepage: No regression - loads correctly with 113+ matches and 'vs' text
✅ Authentication: Test user edittest@test.com login works correctly
✅ Edit workflow: Complete edit → select vote → submit → panel closes cycle works
✅ Remove workflow: Click remove → prediction deleted → UI updated → summary refreshed works

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (All core edit/remove features working, minor UI detection issue)
success_percentage.edit_functionality: 100% (Edit panel, vote selection, submit all working)
success_percentage.remove_functionality: 100% (Remove button, deletion, UI update all working)
